articles.author: Compiled by Janine Van der Post
articles.title: WATCH | Big mods, crazy power? No, Suzuki proves you don't need either for fun on the Knysna Hill
articles.description: Suzuki Auto South Africa is racing three Swift Sports up the Simola Hillclimb this year, along with two motorbikes. Their stock entries prove that you don't need insane power or an expensive car to participate in the fun.
articles.content:
• Suzuki Auto participated in the Simola Hillclimb again in 2023 after its debut up the hill as an Original Equipment Manufacturer.
  • This time, they entered three Suzuki Swift models.
